title: Buddy Antique
description:
Venus of Milo, Nike of Samothrace, Hammurabi Code, etc ... Occupation "Restauronist" Gilbert who makes contracts with various "antiques" and fights with those who have the will. Human x antique buddy battle !!

Artist's Twitter: [url=https://twitter.com/nogi_matsuri]@nogi_matsuri[/url]

matches.title: Fate/Grand Order: Epic of Remnant - Pseudo-Singularity I: Quarantined Territory of Malice, Shinjuku - Shinjuku Phantom Incident
